basics.name: Emanuel Suriano
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary:
I am a motivated, enthusiastic person, and passionate about new technologies. Always building side projects which allow me to always be up to date with the current stack in the field.

I firmly believe in the Open Source philosophy, therefore I am a maintainer of some Open Source project, you can find them inside my GitHub profile. Also, I am keen to contribute to Open Source projects whenever I can because I think is the best to grow as a community.

positions.summary: The main objective of this team is to ensure the quality of all the projects inside the company. Therefore the communication and feedback across teams is crucial.Actions we did to achieve this objective:
highlights: Build a development framework for all frontend teams, which creates stack consistency within all teams and speed up the development process.
Re design architecture of communication layer and composition between Native apps and React Native.
Improve and maintain the company's component library
React and React Native.Technologies involved: React, React Native, Jest, Typescript, Storybook, Cypress, Styled Components.…

positions.summary: Booking is the last step of the process of buying a ticket and one of the most important one due to a fail in this system means user won't come back to the platform. For that reason, it has to be secure and efficient.One of the biggest challenge was to keep up to date on the status with all teams and the dependencies connected with us.On each stage of booking there were different challenges to adress:
highlights: Pre booking: request information to users depending on the provider.
Booking: different payment methods and fraud.
Post booking: email delivery.Tech: React, Css Modules, Storybook, Jest.…

work.summary: I am a maintainer of several open-source projects and I actively contribute to repositories from organizations as well as projects from individual members.

positions.summary: Project for an important air flight company located in the US. Remote collaboration was a daily challenge with members located in more than 5 countries.I had to lead a team of Web developers located in Argentina and actively collaborate with Product Owners and Managers in the United States.The main challenge was to ensure the same development practices and processes along the whole project.Tech: React, Redux, Ramda, Jest, css modules.…

Project for an USA client which was a suite of 12 products built upon a SPA. We build the foundation of the project from the beginning, starting with only one product and then re using as many components as possible in the other products.The development team was located inside Argentina and the product owners were in the States. Nevertheless we followed Scrum practices without any problem.Tech: React, Redux, Jest, Sass, Storybook.…

work.summary: .Net C#, Angular JS, Entity Framework, MVC, WEB API

publications.name: Gatsby Starter Mate
publications.summary: Open Source project to bootstrap an accessible and fast portfolio starter for Gatsby integrated with Contentful CMS. The target audiences are Developers and Tech Writers.

publications.name: Blindle
publications.summary: Open Source and accessible device to learn Braille, driven by the need in the device market for blind people. The project consists of a set of instructions to assemble your own device, from the mechanical parts and 3D parts you need to the code that needs to be installed inside a Raspberry Pi and Arduino boards.
